item.title: CVE-2012-2714|2024-08-06T19:42:31.740Z -- browserid -- browserid
item.description: The BrowserID (Mozilla Persona) module 7.x-1.x before 7.x-1.3 for Drupal allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of arbitrary users via the audience identifier.
